description.en:
Yoplex is a subscription-based streaming service that allows our members to watch TV shows and movies without commercials on an internet-connected device. Its a Decentralised OTT Platform built in YOCoin Blockchain supporting latest technologies and smart contract like NFTs.
You can also download TV shows and movies to your iOS, Android, or Windows 10 device and watch without an internet connection.
If you're already a member and would like to learn more about using Yoplex, visit Getting started with Yoplex.
TV Shows & Movies

Yoplex content varies by region and may change over time. You can watch from a wide variety of award-winning Yoplex Originals, TV shows, movies, documentaries, and more. 
The more you watch, the better Yoplex gets at recommending TV shows and movies we think you’ll enjoy.
Supported Devices

You can watch Yoplex through any internet-connected device that offers the Yoplex app, including smart TVs, game consoles, streaming media players, set-top boxes, smartphones, and tablets. You can also watch Yoplex on your computer using an internet browser.
